content:
Hey folks, I'm working on an overall proposal for the structure of the lang team:

https://hackmd.io/7qfK5yA6Qaat_JTtXd7How

As part of this, I'd like to (a) get some feedback on the description of the docs team, but also (b) to raise the question of whether we want to edit/amend and think about the overall structure here in deeper ways.

The description seems fine.

As for the structure, I'm not sure at this time that it needs to be elaborate or formal. There aren't enough people involved to bother.
it would be nice to elaborate on wikis for better flexibility reducing #s of reviews
sounds good, I sometimes send a review request to the team but it may be noisy, so indeed it might be nice to have a list of who is responsible for each doc
with a wiki I think you would only need moderators though in a sense everyone is responsible for doing that
